cs113.calendar.guiview
Class CalendarArea.AppointmentDisplay

java.lang.Object
  cs113.calendar.guiview.CalendarArea.AppointmentDisplay
Enclosing class:
CalendarArea
private class CalendarArea.AppointmentDisplay
extends java.lang.Object

A bunch of boxes that display an appointment. Why would we have multiple boxes for one appointment? Because days move left-to-right, if an appointment spans days it has to be split up.

Field Summary
private  Appointment appointment
          The appointment all these boxes are for.
private  java.util.ArrayList<CalendarArea.AppointmentBox> boxes
          A box for each day it's in.

          True if this is the appointment being edited.
